metaData.descriptionCS: The child looks at an incomplete matrix and selects the missing portion from five response options.

questions.title: Sample Item A
questions.correctInstructionsHTML:
Correct response:

Say, Right. Let's try another one.
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

Say, Let's look again. All of these butterflies are blue (point to butterflies in grid). This one (point to Response 1) is also blue, so it goes here (point to box with question mark). Let's try another one.

questions.title: Sample Item B
questions.correctInstructionsHTML:
Correct response:

Say, Right. Let’s try another one.
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

Say, Let’s look again. These two light bulbs are yellow (point to yellow light bulbs). Here is a green light bulb (point to green light bulb in grid). We need another green light bulb like this one, so this one (point to Response 5) goes here (point to box with question mark). Let’s try another one.

questions.title: Sample Item C
questions.correctInstructionsHTML:
Correct response:

Say, Right. Let’s try another one.
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

Say, Let’s look again. All of these boxes are blue and have a line through them going this way (point to boxes in grid). This one (point to Response 4) is also blue and has the same line through it, so it goes here (point to box with question mark). Let’s try another one.

discontinueRuleXZerosOutOfY.description: This subtest discontinues after 4 consecutive scores of 0 points or 4 scores of 0 in 5 questions.
